website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you want a versatile and affordable board for various workout routines.
pros: A fun addition to your workout that strengthens legs and improves balance
cons: Some boards have been known to crack, but the company is good about replacing them if this happens to you

customer_reviews.title: cracked down middle
customer_reviews.text: Broke with in 2 months, started cracking on each side down the middle. I am only 180 lbs, but it's suppose to hold alot more weight than that. Disappointed and feel like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after short time
customer_reviews.text: Got this at the end of January 2017. Last night it cracked. Just over the 3 month mark. I am 160 lbs woman. This product is WAY over-priced for how durable (not) it is. Because I bought it through Amazon, I'm outside of the 30 day return policy so I can't even get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Friends of Thursday

customer_reviews.title: Board cracked and I weigh 150 pounds
customer_reviews.text: This board arrived on November 9th. It began to crack on February 17th approximately 100 days later. I weigh 150 pounds and used it 30 minutes per day. Product is not durable even for small person.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rosetti

customer_reviews.title: Wow it works
customer_reviews.text: After 5 minutes you can feel the burn!! I am a big guy in the process of shrinking and this exercise is easy to do. I turn on the tv and twist for about 15 min a day. My only complwint is my pants are too big now...
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week. Can't even handle 78lbs of weight!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my autistic son to have something to balance on while he is watching t.v. He is 11 years old and 78lbs. The board broke in less than a week! How is this possible? The company says the weight limit is 400lbs?!? He's not jumping on it. He's not throwing it off of high places he's literally standing on the edges like he is supposed to. I'm so mad right now. I'm not even the first person to complain about this. It has broken for many people. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olayan

customer_reviews.title: Cracks under normal use!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very happy with my magenta Simply Fit Board. I used it almost every day, for about 30 minutes at a time. I for sure never exceeded the weight limit. After four months, it cracked seriously enough to not be usable anymore. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: I love my simply fit board!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my board faithfully for two and a half weeks . The results have been amazing . People are noticing already ;
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of potential injuries
customer_reviews.text: This board will tone you up, however, it may also cause you knee and hip injuries. I used it for a few months and was happy with the workout, but ended up with a abdominal muscle tear and labral hip injury. My knees constantly ached as well after the workouts. I went online and read reviews with many people having the same injuries and aches. Please be careful. Surgery is not cheap and recovery has been months in the making.
customer_reviews.author: canam_momma

customer_reviews.title: Get this now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! Use every day and it is a great workout, transportable, durable, highly effective! My abs look amazing and you work cardio, core, upper body and lower body in a great variety of You Tube simply fit board free workouts- can't give higher praise for this one!
customer_reviews.author: heidi hogan

customer_reviews.title: Like other commenters
customer_reviews.text: Began cracking after less than 2 months use. Like other commenters, I weigh <200 lbs. Does the manufacturer honor any kind of warranty for this expensive piece of plastic?
customer_reviews.author: John Bork

customer_reviews.title: Great workout, mute the DVD!
customer_reviews.text: Works you much more than you can imagine and was a great buy for the price. Now if we can only get the instructor on the DVD to stop talking incessantly with pitch after pitch after pitch as to why the Simply Fit Board is so great. I KNOW... We already purchased the Simply Fit Board! Please... Quit selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling, and selling. Our ears hurt more than our body from the hard workout!
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: The company DOES NOT stand behind their product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t Buy this board if you really intend to use it!! The company DOES NOT stand behind their product!! I purchased two, and both cracked down the middle after regular use! SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: t. rubert

customer_reviews.title: Nice for little people
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and has lost 12 lbs so far using it at work at her stand up desk. Only complaint is that I'm 315lbs and it won't support me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaych

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: Being 84, it helps me to relearn to balance, after my broken hip 3 years ago, eventually I'' be doing the twist so to speak, great value!!!! Robert Wilson
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. In the 2 months since I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trying to find a workout at home that will not hurt my back or hips as step aerobics was doing. I absolutely love it. In the 2 months since I bought it, I have worked out all but 3 days on the board. I am pain free. I have lost 10 pounds and am getting compliments on how strong and fit I look. I recommend joining the simply fit board challenges on facebook and using the Rosalie Brown work out videos with the board. I simply love my board!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a year
customer_reviews.text: This is a good exercise equipment while watching tv. But used daily it will only last a year and would crack in the middle. So if you don’t mind buying a new one every year then this will work. Otherwise save your money on a better exercise equipment that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ching

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it so far. I did purchase the warranty because of previous reviewers talking about cracking. I weigh 240 and get on it everyday. Also my bf and the kids get on it and cut up with it. No issues so far. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SharlaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked using this to work out with ease on joints. However, with weighing less than half of the weight limit, mine still cracked. I see that other customers have had the same issue. I should expect to last longer than 6 months and I didn't even use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and doesn't take a lot of effort but you feel like you've worked out. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because there was nothing in the box. Some people said they received a DVD or a start up guide and I didn't receive anything. (one person commented that the DVD was taped to the packaging, but there was no packaging with mine) it was a little disappointing. Anyway, I think I am going to like this board. It's also fun and seemingly safe for kids. Not sure if it's recommended or not for kids. Even though there was no DVD I've found several videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got sucked into the hype and purchased this board. I have purchased some bad exercise equipment before; but this is by far, my worst buy yet. As others have said, my board began to crack after only a couple uses. And I purchased the green board. Also, I really don't feel like I am getting any sort of workout at all. I can twist without the board and feel like I worked out more. DO NOT BUY! Belongs at the dollar store, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It Grew On Me
customer_reviews.text: I've had my simply fit board for a few months now. At first I didn't like it because I couldn't stay on it. So I pushed it under my dresser. But little by little, I kept trying it and now I can stay on it for 30 minutes. Mine hasn't snapped in two and the color doesn't rub off on my carpet. I use it with grip socks while watching Hallmark movies. My Apple watch thinks I'm on the elliptical. I won't tell it if you don't. And I am going to keep loving the board.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my back pain
customer_reviews.text: I have advanced degenerative disc disease and wake up most mornings with a very stiff back. I get on this board and start a moving and within a few minutes warm-up my back sufficiently where I get a good start to my morning.
customer_reviews.author: PlanMan

customer_reviews.title: aggressive balance board, broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Overall, i like the balance board but I have to give a low rating due to the fact that it broke after only a few weeks. It is quite "aggressive", so if you want something with only a little movement this is not for you. The price was great, but the quality is low. The board cracked after only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: weak
customer_reviews.text: did a few pushups using it and it started to crack I'd say my upper body weighs around 75 lb's. Had it for about a year but used it on and off, but not nearly close to every day.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Update! Does not last with limited use...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my handicap son for a low impact workout. It's Sturdy and fun for him to learn his balance. Got less then one year out of the product.. It was not misused... My son is 185 lbs and used it three times a week for 15 minutes.. I still will give a two star, since my son ( who is handicapped ) had fun when using it and it did help him learn balance. I just very disappointing that it didn't last longer for the price it cost..
customer_reviews.author: Yukonx

customer_reviews.title: Not for every day standing desk use
customer_reviews.text: I found this product when I was searching for a balance board to use during work daily with my standing desk. 2 months in and it is cracked. At 150 lbs, I’m well within the weight limit and I work from home so i know I’m the only one that uses it. I used it along with its recommended mat so it is not a surface issue either. I don’t know how this would work if used for strenuous exercise, but just standing on it made it break in less than 2 months. Don’t buy this if you’re looking for a board to use daily at work.
customer_reviews.author: Yamiletlee

customer_reviews.title: I weigh 100 pounds and I broke this in five weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second simply fit board and as much as I want to third I refuse to buy one. The return window on this expired a few days ago it’s been a little over a month that I’ve owned this and it already split down the middle, just like my first simply fit board. I’m extremely petite and small boned and barely weigh 100 pounds, if it can’t handle my weight I can’t imagine anyone would be able to use this successfully Really really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: HeyItsMeJake

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy Enough
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Simply Fit Board. The first one cracked after 2 years so we thought we would get another one. Well, It is now just over 2 months and my replacement board has started cracking. I have no one in the house misusing it. The heaviest person using it is 240 pounds. We really like to use it so it gets used almost daily but we are VERY unhappy with the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless item
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Shark Tank - brought it home. I tried it on linoleum floor - I was all over the place. Tried it on carpet - still moved all over. This is a ridiculous item. You can do the same exercises without this board - granted for stability - it might help some people but if you are trying to widdle your waist then save your money and save space where to store this item. It is definitely very sturdy, it is made very well- the color is pretty. I just don't think this will do anything but be tucked away in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzin' in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year-old daughter wanted one of these for Christmas. I was a bit skeptical, but ordered it for her. She loves it! NOTE: She is much more coordinated than I am :-) She can do all kinds of exercises on it...I get exercise just trying to balance on it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

customer_reviews.title: cracked simply fit board
customer_reviews.text: I love the product & does well for me but I have had this for only a little over a month and it has cracked just about in half. one side is cracked the middle & the other side has started. I know the product is rated @ 400lbs & I am only about 160. I have attached photos of the cracks. Please advise. emails can be sent to stacielw@cheqnet.net. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to Feet
customer_reviews.text: The areas where you put your feet are concave, which shapes the foot in a very unnatural way. Feet start to hurt very quickly. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: thequeerinsideme

customer_reviews.title: I got this to help with my balance more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my balance more than to lose weight, and it is actually helping a lot. It takes some getting used to, but over time I'm certain it will help me quite a bit. Afterall, if you can learn to balance on this and twist at the same time, you GOT IT conquered
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: STURDY for your most wiggly of wiggles
customer_reviews.text: Does it burn calories? Probably. Does it do wonders? Yeah, unlikely. Is it really more fun than you'd expect: HELLZ YEAH! I have it in bright orange so you can't resist a twist (or many) walking into the living room where it lives. Sure, the idea was to use it always when watching TV but I own a couch so yeah between the two couch wins always. I'm going to bring this to work for my standing desk so I can twist and wiggle and annoy others as I get fit. Bonus: twirl away from the haters when they wont stop talking.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B.

customer_reviews.title: Twist it and shout it
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. I got this to get in a gentle work out while we’re all home for the shelter in place. It’s super fun and good for stability which most people lack (massage therapist here) so it’s a win for me. I have heard it creak like it could crack, but I’ve had it about a month and use it all the time. I haven’t noticed any weight loss, but that’s cuz I’m in jammies all day snacking...
customer_reviews.author: M. Jafari

customer_reviews.title: NOT for people with lower back issues.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be lower impact and easier for my lower back issues. I tried it for a few minutes and the pain is worst then before. I want to give it a chance, but if it is painful to use, I probably won't keep trying, due to pain. I saw this product on Shark Tank and really want it to work. I can sit in a swivel chair and do the same twisting motion and I have no pain. Maybe great for someone else. Other than painful for me to use, it seems to be a Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. It does NOT work. First of all you can never keep your balance. You always fall off of it between 10 and 30 seconds. While your trying to twist the board moves all over the place. It starts going in circles as soon as you try to do the first twist. It is so not worth it. I wish I can give this thing 0 stars for everything.
customer_reviews.author: peppercorn

customer_reviews.title: It's Great To Use While Watching TV
customer_reviews.text: I have been using The Simply Fit Board since 2016. I use it while watching TV, holding 2lbs weights as I twist. Please read the instructions and take your time getting acquainted with the board. You may find yourself moving with the board at first, but with practice you will be able to stay in place. I recommend you get the Simply Fit Board mat to protect floors. The mat is exclusively designed for the board, so one can exercise for a long period of time without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Loved One J

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but thought I'd give this a try ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but thought I'd give this a try since free returns are offered. This is a keeper. I started feeling the workout after only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory tool for ADHD
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a child with ADHD who is constantly in motion. She loves it, and it's held up quite well. When she's getting frustrated or bored, I remind her about her "Fit Board" and that almost always works to redirect her. She sits on it, twirls on it, stands on it, leans on it, puts it on her head or behind her shoulders - lol. Definitely one of the best purchases I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied. It is not worth  the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for $22 and I found out it was crack on the edge and so it is not effective. I am trying to return it and I am being made to pay for the return and charged extra $4 and some change for what is not my fault. I am paying a total of $26 and some change. This is a rip off!.
customer_reviews.author: Udoka R Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my Simply Fit - it is easy to work ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 52 years old and 5'2 and chubby. I LOVE my Simply Fit - it is easy to work out in front of the TV, best with hand-weights. It took me a couple of days to get the balancing down - but now I'm a pro after a week. I think it'll help with my balance - works my waist, arms legs and butt. Been using it consistently for a month with no problems. I bought a mat to go with it, I think my carpet will thank me. I like the mat too. This was a great investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fun!
customer_reviews.text: **Update** Still great product but DVD includes doesn’t work. Screen is completely blank. DVD player works fine. ** I love this! I had two babies in 3 years and desire to get back in shape. This is great for people that don’t like heavy impact or intense workouts. I usually hate working out and lose motivation, but this is fun. My toddler giggles which makes me giggle so we have fun. He is 3 and even likes to climb on it. It’s not too heavy. Heavy enough that it’s strong, but easy to carry around. I bought another brand from a Aldi and it cracked in half! Stick with this brand one only!! I believe it’s the original.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz87

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I use this board for my standing desk at work. It showed signs of a "stress-fracture" near the middle side of the board, that stress fracture has turned into a full fledge crack. The weight limit is 400 lbs? Well, I weigh 150 and it still cracked. I cant find any way to contact this seller on amazon, I was hoping for some kind of refund or replacement. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitra

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Extremely Cheap- on Board #3 within 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the board 1 star because it's cheaply made; however, I think it works great. My husband and I are most definitely less than the 400ibs weight limit stated and I am on board #3 since June 2017. the product cracks and breaks after a short period of time and I can't identify any warranty information on it so I can't reach out to the manufacturer. It does work be prepared for a short life span on the product.
customer_reviews.author: JAW1251

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My 80 year old uncle uses this every single day, and he has raved about the benefits he has received from this. I bought one for myself to try out, and have been mixing this in a few times a week into my own workout program. This is a simple exercise to do while simply watching TV at the same time. Rather than just lying down, I get to burn a few calories. This is super easy to get used to, and very easy to keep a nice pace for extended periods. Works great for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap!!! I am 155lbs.. have been using this product for just 3 months and it cracked and now I'm told "sorry sucker" your window to return was 2 months ago!!! I actually loved using this product and wanted to continue but I'm sorry I can't back a product that doesn't keep its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Broke within days
customer_reviews.text: My board developed a crack in the middle after 3 days. I'm 200 pounds so I'm not sure the 400 pound support claims are justified. I enjoyed using it while it lasted, but it was definitely not worth $40. Update: Received a replacement board. Also broke within 3 days. Tried to be extra cautious this time to avoid repeating the issue, but it still cracked right down the middle. Love the concept, this is just not a good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the board bend under you as you stand on it. That's okay. It works well and as long as you don't stand too far out on the board (too close to the edges) it doesn't crack or break. Had mine for several months now (and I'm pushing 250lbs) and haven't broken mine yet.
customer_reviews.author: Keirstyn Price

customer_reviews.title: Scared to use
customer_reviews.text: I am 150 pound female and I wanted a new way to workout while having fun. Bought this item and stepped on it and immediately started hearing cracking noises coming from the board. Not sure why it is cracking if it claims to hold 400 pounds. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for excercise, but due to my arthritis, I couldn’t manage much excercise, but I ordered a 2nd one cuz my 4 and 5 year old grandkids have a blast with them. They love to sit and spin on them.... and they are sturdy
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: We also enjoy the show Shark Tank which is where I originally ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom who enjoys working out at home and trying new things. We all got on for a quick try and could almost immediately feel the burn in our legs/butt. That means it's working! We also enjoy the show Shark Tank which is where I originally saw this product. I've also seen it in Bed Bath & Beyond for the same price but they didn't have many colors to choose from. I will be buying one for myself. The kids even liked jumping on and swiveling. I'm interested to see what other exercises are in the DVD.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Good for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept but just not coordinated enough yet to be balanced on it. Great work out and look forward to using it and not holding onto something so as not to fall off. Truly is good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: I am a life-long athlete so wasn't looking for anything spectacular-just wanted something a little different to use at my office on lunch break. I bought this, the mat and a video. It is so FUN and with hand weights it actually can be a good workout! So pleasantly surprised - I just love it. It is fun and effective if done right. Any movement is good movement and you definitely get that with this board. Also, I found a Simply Fit Board subscription on YouTube!
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after only a few months. :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got this product! What a fun way to excercise! I weigh less than 150 pounds, but after only a few months of use, it started cracking. The crack is almost completly across it now and is unusable. I am extremely disappointed. I was hoping to get lots of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Photog

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not this one
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this thing is cheap AF. I’m not even that heavy and the F-er broke. I’m super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karen from Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product cracked right down the middle after less than 2 months of use. I weigh 210 pounds, used it at work, 4 days a week. I am unable to return the item for a refund, b/c it is more than 30 days past purchase. Complete waste of money. If you buy it, but it directly from a seller who will replace it when it breaks at month 2. And before it cracked I was telling everyone I work with to buy one, b/c it was making my back feel better. Now I have to double back and tell them all that it broke.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick, doesn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this to help get rid of my post baby belly. It didn’t. Do. A. Thing. I made sure to use it many times and that I was using it correctly after watching several videos. This thing looks cool, different, fun, and easy, but the truth is you’re better off flexing your own ab muscles while you’re sitting or laying! It’s honestly a waste, do some sit ups free of charge instead of buying this, I’m sure you’ll end up storing it some where and no it won’t get used. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Board Cracked within 60 days
customer_reviews.text: have been using this at work at a standing desk and the board has already begun a deep crack. Not impressed with durability as I've had this for under 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: GameofBeards

customer_reviews.title: Positive purchase, no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of the Simply Fit Board. There are 4 adults and 2 teenagers in my home. None of us have done a workout, but each of us have taken a random turn throughout the day to spend a minute or two on the fit board. It's fun and easy. It has added a little more movement to our day we would otherwise not have.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful808

customer_reviews.title: Exactly 32 days after use - the defects begin
customer_reviews.text: I'm 170 lbs and I use this board with a standing desk at work. I don't partake in any aggressive exercises with it, just stand on it to alleviate the pressure off my heels. Just as the return window expired, I noticed white stress lines start to form on each side of the mid section. Within a week, the color distortion developed into full tears in the plastic. Unfortunately, I made the mistake of trusting the high rating on amazon and not diving into the comments to discover this is a very common issue. The customer support number provided told me they no longer honor the 1 year guarantee. This is no longer a supported product. Strongly advise researching alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Miyan

customer_reviews.title: Received used item
customer_reviews.text: The Simply Fit board I received was obviously someone else's return. It was scratched with ripped stickers and was missing the instruction manual. :(
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's decent, but it's not a replacement for working out...
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. It's a nice way to squeeze in some motion so you can stay active even on your lazy days :-) At first, keeping your balance can be trick, but if you are careful, you'll be swiveling comfortably in a minute or two. Be mindful that as you swive, you are likely to drift. The board will move around on the floor. So, give yourself some space. As you get better, though, you will be able to control your drift and keep yourself mostly stationary. It's an easy way to stay active and keep yourself moving.
customer_reviews.author: Guy who buys stuff...

customer_reviews.title: Love the Simply Fit Board!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Simply Fit Board! It's a great full body workout when you follow the workouts available online. It also come with a DVD. I like that it's more of a quiet workout and easy on the joints. I hate jumping around in my hosue making a bunch of noise so this is perfect. Get a set of handweights for the workouts and you really can get great results.
customer_reviews.author: J&J

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The product lasted for 62 days! Return expired in 60 days. Very disappointing. We thought this would be a quality product but we've had two of them crack down the middle with normal usage per instructions. I think Lori Greiner should investigate. We will be more cautious in the future for these products.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: I do like it! I can feel the next day where ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like it! I can feel the next day where it works. I do wish I used it more! Lol Only aggravating part...it creates a static electricity when twisting and collects dog hair from the carpet. Easy to wipe off with a damp rag though.
customer_reviews.author: AEWilliams

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these for Mother's Day and my daughter and i have had so much fun goofing off with it. It's tricky because it is a blast, but is actually exercise and helps your balance and coordination. My 6 year old niece was at my house and loved playing on it. Since then, I have bought 2 more as gifts for my niece and a friend's 6 year old boy. They both love to play on it and it is helping them learn how to balance. OH, mine came with a work out video, this one didn't (this one was for a child) but the video is GREAT and huuuuurts in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars was good while it lasted. Definite problem.  1 star!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Feel like I am doing something good for my body and having fun! Addendum : have used this religiously since april. It now has two cracks in it. Disappointed. I'm not huge. Weigh 180 lbs at 5 feet 7 inches. Addedum: 2nd board has a crack just like the last one with less than a year of use. Don't get hooked on it because your board will break. Don't buy! I love this workout but will now come up with something else. This sucks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as your balance is good
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as your balance is good. You can really feel it working your core. I had to hold onto a chair until I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm IMPRESSED! Have been using this for a couple of weeks and already feel/see a difference. I had to quit jogging recently for a minor foot injury, but I am able to keep in shape with my Simply Fit Board. Of course, I am not getting the cardio, but I am able to work my leg muscles and core, and not hurt my foot with this device. On top of that, it is fun to use while watching television. Just standing on it helps my balance. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and so fun!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday and I already love it. I was worried about being able to balance on it and had no problems. I'm excited to use it as part of my weight loss journey and would definitely recommend it to anyone. I may even get one for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sutula

customer_reviews.title: Beware they can crack!
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after few months of use past time to be able to return. They are a good workout but if you check the reviews lots of them crack. Under 250lbs.
customer_reviews.author: tallboy20

customer_reviews.title: I go around in a circle lol
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could just get on this and twist but it doesn’t stay put as well as it is a balancing act. I try to hold onto a chair otherwise I slowly go around in a circle lol. Not sure of the benefits really. I am 5’8” tall 122lbs. Thought I could do this and my stair stepper while watching tv but not if you’re going around in a circle.. others probably have better luck. I get on it because it’s a challenge to stay put. Haven’t mastered it yet. Fun though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamahero

customer_reviews.title: Used with standup desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a stand-up desk at home and work, but find that my feet get tired and sore. I've tried foam pads, better shoes, but nothing was helping. I bought this board not for the twist-exercise use, but to use as a fidget board so I keep moving around and not standing in a stationary position. Works great! I bee-bop and fidget all day now and when I'm on vacation my cubicle neighbor steals it to fidget during her conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Cracking
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but with normal use and proper form. I noticed during today’s pushups that the board is starting to crack. Does not speak well for the quality not to mention a safety hazard should it have cracked while working out. I could have been injured.
customer_reviews.author: mary wesley

customer_reviews.title: Cracked with little use in less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using my simply fit board while watching TV, but was recently shocked to see a crack in the board. I have had it less than 3 months, and it is already cracking! The heaviest person in our household is 190 lbs, and it is ridiculous that it didn't even make it 3 months without cracking. I am so disappointed! Of course, the return window has already passed, so what can I do? If I bought this from a store, I might be able to take it in and get an exchange. But with the short return window with Amazon, I guess I'm just stuck.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a sucker
customer_reviews.text: I'm overweight from having a baby but I'm a fit person. I thought this would be a fun exercise to do in front of the TV. I feel like a sucker. The thing slides all over the place, destroys area rugs and it's almost impossible to get your heart rate up without a boring a hole through the floor. I also doubt it would hold up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Cracks in two months
customer_reviews.text: Great low-impact workout but don't use it too often or it will crack. 220lbs and used it on a mat as recommended by manufacturer. They don't have a phone number to reach customer support. Oh well. They had a great idea, took the money and ran.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Christmas and it cracked in half. I am not nearly at the 400lb limit (only 120 lb) and I use it as recommended (I just use this for light cardio doing the regular twisting...not all the bs other workouts they try to sell). It lasted about 7 months, but when I called Simply Fit customer service, they said it is only guaranteed for 75 days. So, if you order this, just know that it will crack and if it doesn't do it before 75 days, you will just have to buy another one... Amazon customer service also did nothing to help. Do not buy this item...
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but its now starting to crack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the orange one in July and now its March and its starting to crack like some others have said. It worked well before the crack. Easy to use, small and portable. Too bad it didn't even last the year. I'm 160 lbs and used this about 15-30 mins a day so it should have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This board works great for men and women - heavy or light. It comes with a video and is easy to use. It is wide so it works for small or large feet. It is recommended to put a rug or something under it if you use it on a wood floor so it won't mess up the wood. It is sturdy and has marks for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn’t have a warranty when purchased from outside vendors.
customer_reviews.text: Love this workout but the board cracked and the company wouldn’t do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: BrianS

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Per usual, Amazon came through for me! Arrived 1 day before schedule. Packaged perfectly and all items accounted for. It's taking some time to get used to the board but it is fun and hopefully will get me back in shape. Thank you amazon! Love you
customer_reviews.author: Erica Eby

customer_reviews.title: Easy , fun and effective
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love this simple exercise device. It is so easy to use and we both are definitely seeing results. We bought a second board so we could twist togetherness!
customer_reviews.author: Lisalou

customer_reviews.title: Fun workout
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing. It's fun and definitely a good work out. My teenage daughter who is very fit and athletic gets an intense work out with this in a short amount of time. It does take a few minutes to get the hang of but if you watch an instructional video online it helps and you'll be up and twisting in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My whole family plays on this. It makes a great faux skateboard trick practice tool when the teens are trapped in the house due to rain. My burly husband even likes to twist his way to a flat stomach and bulging abs. But I have to be fair in the review...My dogs don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will be returning this
customer_reviews.text: the board seems like it will not last long. ive used it twice but it just bends too much and i feel like it will snap one day.... as for the work out, its great. I wish they would just improve the board so it was more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have had any knee injuries.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get the Simply Fit Board, but it ended up making my knees hurt. (I had injured my knees in a bad fall years ago, but had not had pain in quite a while.) I tried placing my feet closer and further apart, but still it caused me problems. If you have no knee issues, I'm sure it is a fun way to exercise. I was disappointed, hence the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the return policy better..
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the return policy better... This was a Christmas gift and within 3 weeks the board broke. It was used as specified. Looks like I am just stuck with a very low-quality product. Very disappointed. I also have a useless mat and video.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain too!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! It is so easy to use. Just keep it in your Livingroom, and pull it out while watching! Great exercise. Also is great for back pain, I suffer from EDS and my back get very stiff, and painful. I will pull this out and stretch my back out, I can really see a difference in both my pain, and my core!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: DOORBUSTER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my fit an firm, it’s awsome, ***** people out there, this is a MUSTHAVE, I’m not kidding, it’s GREAT!!!!! Twist twist an turn/Twist an Turn, COOOL, comes with video, you Rock to your favorite songs, lol lol AWSOME, DOORBUSTER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Hoad

customer_reviews.title: It's TWISTING TIME AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Step easily at 1st & hold on. Carpet is best,then work up to tile/wood. It's like bike...as you get your balance. I was working on my waistline, I found my balance improved. I found a rythm that works w/ any music . No more "no time " excuse. It's 98 outside in Texas. I have the time.
customer_reviews.author: MomChef

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this, there are lots of exercises that you can download off guides to mix up the routines and schedules. However, mine broke (right down the middle) 2.5 months in, very disappointing. I'm well under the weight limit and used it on a conservative frequency (3x week).
customer_reviews.author: A. Hosanna

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I started losing weight on day one and I'm still losing, it's just a little bit at a time but it's the incentive I needed to keep at something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Far better purchase than I expected. With daily use you will find it does help strengthen your core and reduce back and hit pain. Miracle cure? No. Help you help yourself to reduce the causes of some pain and aches? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Coloradofamily

customer_reviews.title: It will break  I’m 230lbs 6’2” good workout
customer_reviews.text: Wow, okay you can get a pretty good sweat going in 45 mins on this thing at high intensity. Two stars for fun workout.. However it has a design flaw. Eventually it will crack and break. Friction and plastic... you’d think they’d have enough sense to not go cheap on thickness. You’d need to buy two and zip tie them together. Or maybe somebody makes a legit fit board cause they can’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Workout Option for Indoors
customer_reviews.text: I use my Simply Fit board about 2-3 times a week, for about 40 minutes at a time. It's nice for those of us living in cold climates, when we can't get out in the winter weather to walk. I turn on the TV and use this while my favorite shows are on, and my rule for myself is that I have to keep going until the show ends.This is not a hardcore workout, but it does help me keep active in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: MomTeach

customer_reviews.title: i'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Much harder to learn to use than I would have thought. But by going online and watching the tutorials, I learned to practice with weights in both hands, still tricky but much easier. I'm up to the challenge and this will keep me busy for quite a while conquering this contraption at the age of 66 and being about 25 pounds overweight. i'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C J Burt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. You can feel this working your legs almost immediately
customer_reviews.author: Kya Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to exercise!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun & effective product for someone who needs low to no impact exercise. Once you get used to balancing (take your time!), you can spend quite a bit of time twisting & moving on it without killing your joints! The naysayers like to criticize this gadget, but it really does what it says it'll do, IF you use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: gapch

product_meta.title: Simply Fit Board - The Workout Balance Board with a Twist, As Seen on TV
feature_bullets: FITNESS WITH FUN – Simply Fit Board is the effective way to get fit in minutes a day. Twist your way into your fat burning zone. Improve balance and coordination. Gain strength by toning your abs, legs, core, and upper body!

STRONG, ANTI-SLIP MATERIAL – Made from Premium Quality ABS engineering plastic. Lightweight, strong and durable. Your Simply Fit Board will support up to 400 lbs, designed with special Anti-Slip Surface that makes training safer and more comfortable.
LIGHTWEIGHT – Due to its weight of just 3.2 lbs, the Simply Fit Board can easily be packed into a suitcase or backpack for convenient travel. Board measures: 26”L x 11”W x 4”D.

AS SEEN ON SHARK TANK – Lori Greiner takes a low impact, easy to use workout board to the next level. You will see highly effective results and can even use hand weights to take your workout to the next level.

IMPROVE YOUR BALANCE – Ideal for home training, our balance board is great for men and women alike. Keeps you fit at any age. Best if used on carpeted surface. Great for everyone even if you don’t like exercising because you’re twisting into shape!

VERSATILE – The Simply Fit Board is the ideal choice for making your workout fun! Use this multifunctional balance board as a plank board, a push-up support or a twist board and reap all the benefits this amazing product has to offer!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
